titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of November 4 through November 8, 2019, as "National Family Service Learning Week".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of November 4 through November 8, 2019, as "National Family Service Learning Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This resolution (1) expresses support for the designation of the week of November 4-November 8, 2019, as National Family Service Learning Week, (2) recognizes the importance of family service learning in cultivating civic engagement and community investment, and (3) encourages the public to support family service learning and community development programs. Family service learning is a multigenerational problem-solving approach that utilizes active participation to meet community needs and develop the skillsets of children and families.
